casebody.data:
Third Department,

February, 1964 *

(February 20, 1964) Joseph H. Mann, Jr., Respondent, v. John Hancock Mutual Life Insurance Company, Appellant. John Hancock Mutual Life Insurance Company, Defendant and Interpleading Plaintiff, v. Anna F. Mann et al., Interpleaded Defendants-Appellants.

Hot published with other decisions of Feb. 20, 1964, 20 A D 2d 731.— [Rep.

Decision of December 27, 1963 amended to provide for an allowance of $400 to John Hancock Mutual Life Insurance Company for its expenses, costs and disbursements to be paid out of the proceeds of the insurance policy. (CPLR 1006, subd. [f].) Gibson, P. J., Herlihy, Reynolds, Taylor and Aulisi, JJ., concur.
